body: after a few years when i read it again it's still as good as it was back then it's still really good after all this time for me really great

This one is incomplete, hentaicafe has the full version in english. Basically, they are speaking of sex, and the girl is a virgin, but she keeps lying to her friends, she tell her boyfriend she wants sex, he refuses, she get drunk and go with old man, ntr shit happens, and in the end looks like the whole ntr story is her telling more lies to her friends again....
What the hell with this shit, my heart is hurt when I read this shit.
